java/liquibase/lock/LockHandler.java

00001 package liquibase.lock;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLogLock;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.UpdateStatement;
00007 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00008 import liquibase.exception.LockException;
00009 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00010 
00011 import java.net.InetAddress;
00012 import java.sql.Timestamp;
00013 import java.text.DateFormat;
00014 import java.util.*;
00015 
00016 public class LockHandler {
00017 
00018     private Database database;
00019     private boolean hasChangeLogLock = false;
00020 
00021     private long changeLogLockWaitTime = 1000 * 60 * 5;  //default to 5 mins
00022 
00023     private static Map<Database, LockHandler> instances = new HashMap<Database, LockHandler>();
00024 
00025     private LockHandler(Database database) {
00026         this.database = database;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public static LockHandler getInstance(Database database) {
00030         if (!instances.containsKey(database)) {
00031             instances.put(database, new LockHandler(database));
00032         }
00033         return instances.get(database);
00034     }
00035 
00036     public boolean acquireLock() throws LockException {
00037         if (!database.doesChangeLogLockTableExist()) {
00038             throw new LockException("Could not acquire lock, table does not exist");
00039         }
00040 
00041         try {
00042             Boolean locked;
00043             try {
00044                 locked = (Boolean) database.getJdbcTemplate().queryForObject(database.getSelectChangeLogLockSQL(), Boolean.class);
00045             } catch (JDBCException e) {
00046                 if (!database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
00047                     //expected
00048                     locked = false;
00049                 } else {
00050                     throw new LockException("Error checking database lock status", e);
00051                 }
00052             }
00053             if (locked) {
00054                 return false;
00055             } else {
00056                 UpdateStatement updateStatement = new UpdateStatement(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName());
00057                 updateStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKED", true);
00058                 updateStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKGRANTED", new Timestamp(new java.util.Date().getTime()));
00059                 updateStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKEDBY", InetAddress.getLocalHost().getCanonicalHostName() + " (" + InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostAddress() + ")");
00060                 updateStatement.setWhereClause("ID  = 1");
00061 
00062                 database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Lock Database");
00063                 int rowsUpdated = database.getJdbcTemplate().update(updateStatement);
00064                 if (rowsUpdated != 1) {
00065                     if (!database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
00066                         //expected
00067                     } else {
00068                         throw new LockException("Did not update change log lock correctly");
00069                     }
00070                 }
00071                 database.commit();
00072                 LogFactory.getLogger().info("Successfully acquired change log lock");
00073 
00074                 hasChangeLogLock = true;
00075                 return true;
00076             }
00077         } catch (Exception e) {
00078             throw new LockException(e);
00079         }
00080 
00081     }
00082 
00083     public void releaseLock() throws LockException {
00084         if (database.doesChangeLogLockTableExist()) {
00085             try {
00086                 UpdateStatement releaseStatement = new UpdateStatement(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName());
00087                 releaseStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKED", false);
00088                 releaseStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKGRANTED", null);
00089                 releaseStatement.addNewColumnValue("LOCKEDBY", null);
00090                 releaseStatement.setWhereClause(" ID = 1");
00091 
00092                 database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Release Database Lock");                
00093                 int updatedRows = database.getJdbcTemplate().update(releaseStatement);
00094                 if (updatedRows != 1) {
00095                     if (database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
00096                         throw new LockException("Did not update change log lock correctly.\n\n" + releaseStatement + " updated " + updatedRows + " instead of the expected 1 row.");
00097                     }
00098                 }
00099                 database.commit();
00100                 hasChangeLogLock = false;
00101 
00102                 LogFactory.getLogger().info("Successfully released change log lock");
00103             } catch (Exception e) {
00104                 throw new LockException(e);
00105             }
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109     public DatabaseChangeLogLock[] listLocks() throws LockException {
00110         if (!database.doesChangeLogLockTableExist()) {
00111             return new DatabaseChangeLogLock[0];
00112         }
00113 
00114         try {
00115             List<DatabaseChangeLogLock> allLocks = new ArrayList<DatabaseChangeLogLock>();
00116             RawSqlStatement sqlStatement = new RawSqlStatement((("SELECT ID, LOCKED, LOCKGRANTED, LOCKEDBY FROM " + database.escapeTableName(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName()))));
00117             List<Map> rows = database.getJdbcTemplate().queryForList(sqlStatement);
00118             for (Map columnMap : rows) {
00119                 Boolean locked = (Boolean) columnMap.get("LOCKED");
00120                 if (locked != null && locked) {
00121                     allLocks.add(new DatabaseChangeLogLock((Integer) columnMap.get("ID"), (Date) columnMap.get("LOCKGRANTED"), (String) columnMap.get("LOCKEDBY")));
00122                 }
00123             }
00124             return allLocks.toArray(new DatabaseChangeLogLock[allLocks.size()]);
00125         } catch (Exception e) {
00126             throw new LockException(e);
00127         }
00128     }
00129 
00130     public void waitForLock() throws LockException {
00131         if (hasChangeLogLock) {
00132             return;
00133         }
00134 
00135         try {
00136             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogLockTable();
00137 
00138             boolean locked = false;
00139             long timeToGiveUp = new Date().getTime() + changeLogLockWaitTime;
00140             while (!locked && new Date().getTime() < timeToGiveUp) {
00141                 locked = acquireLock();
00142                 if (!locked) {
00143                     System.out.println("Waiting for changelog lock....");
00144                     try {
00145                         Thread.sleep(1000 * 10);
00146                     } catch (InterruptedException e) {
00147                         ;
00148                     }
00149                 }
00150             }
00151 
00152             if (!locked) {
00153                 DatabaseChangeLogLock[] locks = listLocks();
00154                 String lockedBy;
00155                 if (locks.length > 0) {
00156                     DatabaseChangeLogLock lock = locks[0];
00157                     lockedBy = lock.getLockedBy() + " since " + DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(DateFormat.SHORT, DateFormat.SHORT).format(lock.getLockGranted());
00158                 } else {
00159                     lockedBy = "UNKNOWN";
00160                 }
00161                 throw new LockException("Could not acquire change log lock.  Currently locked by " + lockedBy);
00162             }
00163         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00164             if (!database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements()) {
00165                 ; //nothing to do
00166             } else {
00167                 throw new LockException(e);
00168             }
00169         }
00170     }
00171 
00175     public void forceReleaseLock() throws LockException, JDBCException {
00176         database.checkDatabaseChangeLogLockTable();
00177 
00178         releaseLock();
00179     }
00180 
00181 }
